title: Yale UFO Society hosts panel calling for government transparency
description: The Yale Student UFO Society in conjunction with the Disclosure Foundation hosted a panel calling for the government to pass UFO disclosure legislation.The post Yale UFO Society hosts panel calling for government transparency appeared first on Yale Daily News.

title: Police chopper was forced to take 'emergency evasive action' after being targeted by UFO over US air base
description: The helicopter's pilots believed they were being pursued by an unidentified craft at high speed, and now newly released police logs have cast doubt on the official explanation

title: Plume from 'mystery UFO' 3I/Atlas 'could be technological signature', expert claims
description: The mysterious interstellar visitor known as 3I/Atlas has gripped stargazers for months and while Nasa boffins insist it is a comet, theoretical physicist Avi Loeb believes it is far from conclusive

title: Police chopper was forced to take 'emergency evasive action' after being targeted by UFO over US air base last year, unearthed report reveals
description: Newly released video and incident logs of a police helicopter's November 2024 encounter with mystery drones tell a very different story from initial aviation official reports, the Daily Mail can reveal.

title: UFO Moviez & Miraj Cinemas partner to broaden national ad footprint
description: UFO Moviez has entered into a strategic partnership with Miraj Cinemas, securing exclusive advertising rights across 239 screens operated by the multiplex chain in 49 cities and 72 locations. The agreement expands UFO Moviez’s on-screen advertising network to more than 4,050 screens nationwide, including over 2,450 multiplex screens.According to the companies, the combined network now carries an annual audience capacity of more than 1.20 billion across 1,900 locations, with 830 screens equipped with recliner seating. Miraj Cinemas, currently India’s third-largest multiplex operator, continues to add properties in Tier 1 and Tier 2 markets, with a focus on upgraded projection, sound systems and premium-format auditoriums.Rajesh Mishra, Executive Director and Group CEO of UFO Moviez, said the partnership would extend the company’s national footprint. “We are delighted to join hands with Miraj Cinemas in a strategic alliance that significantly strengthens our nationwide presence, taking our total advertising footprint to over 4,050 screens, including more than 2,450 multiplex screens. Miraj is one of India’s fastest-growing and most trusted cinema chains, and their addition brings unparalleled value to our premium inventory,” he said.
